description:
Known simply as "Confession Girl" she is a fellow student at the Asunaro Private High School. During school field trip she musters the courage to ask http://anidb.net/ch142873 [Otogi Morihito] to go out with her.
Otogi flatly refuses as he doesn`t know her. Questioned if there is someone else he likes he answers negatively but then adds that there is actually http://anidb.net/ch142875 [a person that he cares about].
name: Kokuhaku Joshi
